/*kr.happy.study.pcm.dao.PcmOrderListDao.pcmOrderOne*/ SELECT od.orderid , cp.comp_nm , sa.sales_nm , oi.order_cnt , od.regdate , od.confirmYN , ph.depositYN
FROM tb_orderdir od inner join tb_orderinfo oi on oi.order_id = od.order_id inner join tb_sales sa on sa.sales_id = oi.sales_id inner join tb_detail_code dc on dc.detail_code = sa.sales_type and dc.group_code = 'proCD' inner join tb_comp cp on oi.comp_id = cp.comp_id inner join tb_purchase ph on ph.pur_id = oi.pur_id WHERE od.orderid = #{orderid}
